channel.title: Projects on Pratik Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Pratik Patel

item.title: Amazon Price Tracker
item.description: This was a personal project where I used Python to build a price scraper. The two hottest commodities right now are Stanley Cups and Cryptocurrencies. There are two parts to this project. First, I worked on using BeautifulSoup to scrape the prices of Stanley Cups on Amazon. It will check the price every five seconds. The output is put into a csv file. This entire process automated. For the cryptocurrencies, I used the CoinMarketCap API to pull in the data. Same as the Stanley's, the information is turned into a csv. For this part of the project, I made a visual using Tableau.

item.title: Movies Analysis
item.description: This project was part of my Youtube channel where I build a yahoo finance web-scrapper to get stock prices from yahoo finance, This project was inspired as I was actively investing in the stock market and needed to automate the process to get and analyse data faster for various companies. The yahoo fin package help solves that huddle as it allow to automate the process through a script written in python.
